name: Ghost Movers
description:
Creepy things are happening in LobbyLand. People got scared, and left their houses. However, they forgot something, their valuable stuff!
Can you return their valuable items without getting caught by the ghost wandering around in the house?

Interact with the Table and start returning those items, before it is too late.

Contributors:

  • GewoonJaap
  • GrasPlukker


Controls:

WASD for movement

Hold left shift to sprint

Q to drop

C to pickup
E to interact
F to turn on/off flashlight

ESC for pause menu
